title: Switch app theme from sunset orange to sky blue

requirements.text: Update the global theme color tokens to a sky-blue primary palette (replacing the current sunset-orange palette) while keeping the overall dark, vibrant, readable look across the app (buttons, links, focus rings, gradients, icons, and interactive states).

quotes: with sky blue change the theme

acceptanceCriteria: Primary brand color throughout the UI appears sky blue (not sunset orange).
Text, borders, and focus rings maintain accessible contrast on dark surfaces.
No new UI features are introduced; only theming/visual styling changes.

requirements.text: Update premium shadow/glow styling to match the new sky-blue palette, including the reusable premium shadow utilities and any Tailwind theme shadow tokens that currently embed sunset-orange glow values.

quotes: with sky blue change the theme

acceptanceCriteria: Cards and elevated surfaces show a subtle sky-blue glow instead of orange.
No regressions to general shadow depth/legibility on dark mode.

requirements.text: Update the app-wide backdrop treatment to match the sky-blue theme by replacing the current sunset-orange tinted overlay gradients used by the .app-backdrop styling, while preserving layering (z-index), opacity behavior, and reduced-motion behavior for the subtle drift animation.

quotes: with sky blue change the theme

acceptanceCriteria: Backdrop overlay gradients have a sky-blue/cool-toned mood instead of orange/amber.
The background image layer and overlay remain subtle and do not reduce text readability.
Reduced-motion preference continues to disable the drift animation.

requirements.text: Add a new generated background image asset with a sky-blue art direction and update the app to use it as the app-backdrop background image URL.

quotes: with sky blue change the theme

acceptanceCriteria: A new sky-blue background image exists under frontend/public/assets/generated and is used by the .app-backdrop background-image.
The backdrop is visibly applied on both authenticated AppShell screens and the unauthenticated AuthGate screen.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose existing UI components instead).

Do not modify any files listed in frontend.immutablePaths (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui).
Backend must remain single-actor; no backend changes are required for a theme update.
nonGoals: Do not add new product features or change application flows (Trip Planner, Trips Dashboard, Trip Plan views).
Do not change backend data models, persistence, or APIs.
Do not introduce third-party theming libraries or non-standard framework changes.

required: Subtle premium travel background with sky-blue mood, low-noise, readable behind content (bg-travel-spiritual-historical-beach-sky-blue.dim_1920x1080.png)
